page.title: 15 The Village Policeman.
page.content: Police Constable A.Blackwell Lives in the police House High Street Woodford Halse.His immediate superior is at the Police Station,New Street, Daventry.Mr Blackwell usually reports into HQ by two - way radio when he commences his tour of duty.His area of responsibility includes,as well as Woodford,Byfield, Preston Capes,Canons Ashby,Adstone,and Maidford.However,when officers from neighbouring beats are off duty or on holiday,he has to provide some sort of cover for them as well.When he calls up H.Q.,they normally give him a list of jobs to do including enquires to be followed up.When all this is completed he returns to his house where he has an office and he is able to his paperwork. He may recieve other jobs to do during the day through his radio which,if urgent,means driving off in his police car to the scene of the emergency.
